The Sinhala: language text in the image translates to English as "Contact us if you are a resident in an area affected by the coronavirus / Sri Lanka's 'Red Star' has an allowance of 5000 Sri Lankan rupees for you."
The Red Star is a relief organization ru: s People's Liberation Front party, known locally as the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) party.
The People: s Liberation Front party's Chief of Media Upul Ranjan denied the claims and stated that they have not taken measures to distribute 5000 Sri Lankan rupees or arrange facilities to quarantine individuals who have been instructed to self-isolate themselves.
